hero.title: Flash Your LV06 or LV07 Directly from the Web
hero.description: Connect your device, select your model and board version, and start flashing immediately. No setup required.
hero.loggingDescription: Connect your device, log the serial data and download it later on.

fastFlashing.title: Fast Flashing
fastFlashing.description: Flash your LV06 / LV07 in seconds, not minutes.

webBased.title: Web-Based
webBased.description: No need for special software. Use your web browser.

multipleBoards.title: Multiple Boards
multipleBoards.description: Support for various Bitaxe boards and modules.

instructions.title: How to Use

steps.1: Connect your LV06 / LV07 to your computer.
steps.2: Click "Connect Device" and select your device from the popup.
steps.3: Select your device model from the dropdown.
steps.5: Click "Start Flashing" to begin the process.
steps.6: Wait for the flashing process to complete.
